alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 4:56PM CDT until May 16 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Central Grainger County in east Tennessee... East central Union County in east Tennessee... Western Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maynardville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Jefferson City, Maynardville, Rutledge, Bean Station, White Pine, Panther Creek State Park, Alpha, Joppa and Rose Hill. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 3 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
